10.ara-name: كتاب الجنائز عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"The Messenger of Allah performed Salat over Suhail bin Al-Baida in the Masjid

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى الْمَيِّتِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Salat For The Deceased In The Masjid
